meanings.definition: Existing or occurring within a cell.
meanings.sent1: The tiny organelles perform important functions in the intracellular environment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the intracellular processes to understand cell behavior.
meanings.sent3: The intracellular party was so exclusive, even the nucleus couldn't get in!
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like intracellular whispers, hidden from the outside world.
meanings.sent5: The intracellular world is like a bustling city within each cell.

meanings.definition: Located or taking place within a cell.
meanings.sent1: The intracellular structures play a crucial role in cell function.
meanings.sent2: Nutrients are transported through intracellular pathways.
meanings.sent3: The intracellular hide-and-seek game was intense among the organelles.
meanings.sent4: His creativity was an intracellular treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The intracellular activities resemble a complex network of roads within a city.
